page.title: 09Transport in Bredfield.
page.content: There are three bus services through Dallinghoo and Bredfield a week. One on Thursday morning to Woodbridge which is the nearest town, and one which comes back in the afternoon. On Saturday morning there is a bus to Ipswich, the county town of Suffolk, and a return bus in the afternoon, and there is a bus to Woodbridge on Saturday afternoon with a return bus later. The children from Dallinghoo, Debach and Boulge who go to Bredfield Primary School, and all the older children from the area who go to Kingston Middle School, or Farlingaye High School are taken by bus. Otherwise people must have their own transport.
